title: President confers civil awards on Pakistani citizens, foreign nationals
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 14 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi on the occasion of Independence Day conferred civil awards on citizens of Pakistan as well as foreign nationals for showing excellence and courage in their respective fields and for martyrs of COVID-19.The investiture ceremony for the following civil awards will take place on Pakistan Day on March 23, 2024:-
(i). NISHAN-I-IMTIAZ
(iii). HILAL-I-SHUJAAT
